pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: Music for the connoisseur [sound recording] : Forgotten music II.
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: In 1st work: David Saxon and Barnett Cardell [i.e. Gardel], violins ; Kellman Flizig [i.e. Calman Flesig], viola ; George Fayer, violoncello. In 2nd-4th work: William Warfield, baritone ; Otto Hertz [i.e. Herz], piano. In 5th work: Claude Debussy, piano. David Randolph ; with unidentified radio announcer.
